definition: windblown dust/hardships of travel/vicissitudes of life/prostitution
lit. with a face full of dust/showing the hardships of travel (idiom)

sentences.english: You look worn - out after your long journey .
sentences.chinese: 你走了很长的路，看上去风尘仆仆。

sentences.english: He be fatigued with the journey to school, is two days.
sentences.chinese: 他风尘仆仆的来到学校的时候，已经是两天后了。

sentences.english: Gerald bronzed in the face and travel-stained from head to foot .
sentences.chinese: 杰勒德面孔晒得黝黑黝黑，从头到脚风尘仆仆。

sentences.english: And some, Spread their wings like eagles and soar on the wind.
sentences.chinese: 而有的人，如鹰隼试翼，风尘翕张。

sentences.english: He was on his way to China again.
sentences.chinese: 他又风尘仆仆地踏上了去中国的旅程。

sentences.english: She looks unhappy and in dire need of a bath.
sentences.chinese: 她看起来怏怏不乐，并且风尘仆仆需要沐浴一番。

sentences.english: By then, hundreds of thousands of people in Europe and America to drive home the road reunion.
sentences.chinese: 届时，千千万万的欧美人风尘仆仆地赶回家中团聚。

definition: the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
great changes/ups and downs/vicissitudes/abbr. of 滄海桑田|沧海桑田[cang1 hai3 sang1 tian2]
the dust of a long journey
mundane world (in religious context)/this mortal coil
romance/beautiful scenery/small or petty (of talk etc)
